name: GRIEF (itch) (Decathlannix)
description:
GRIEF is a 2D, atmospheric game, made in Godot, created as a 1st semester project for a Game Design and Development Masters course, conducted in the University of Aveiro, Portugal, between 2022 and 2023.
Play as a young girl, Wendy, and experience the rollercoaster of emotions and memories that come about as she deals with the mourning of her lost brother, Benjamin.
The inspiration for this idea came from the Kübler-Ross Model, that describes the "5 stages of grief" - denial anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance.

Developed by the Glassy Turtles team:

Daniela Gomes
Daniel Francisco
José Santos
Nuno Neto
Nuno Veloso
